title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, an error occurs.
EB: The synchronization process should complete successfully without any errors.
SR:
1. Open the IDE.
2. Create a new .java file.
3. Add or modify code in the .java file.
4. Attempt to synchronize the .java file with another resource.
5. Verify that the synchronization completes without any errors.
